column1: Usehat is a town and a nagar panchayat in Badaun district in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh. It is a town in usawan block.
Usehat is located at 27.82°N 79.25°E﻿ / 27.82; 79.25. It has an average elevation of 152 metres (498 feet).
